name: storydocker-examples
description: Auto-generated application environments for testing Storybook and StoryDocker

scripts.local-children: npx concurrently "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-lit -- --port 6001 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-lit-ts -- --port 6002 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-preact -- --port 6003 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-preact-ts -- --port 6004 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-react -- --port 6005 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-react-ts -- --port 6006 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-svelte -- --port 6007 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-svelte-ts -- --port 6008 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-vanilla -- --port 6009 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-vanilla-ts -- --port 6010 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-vue -- --port 6011 --no-open" "npm run storybook -workspace examples/vite-vue-ts -- --port 6012 --no-open"
scripts.local-parent: npx wait-on http://localhost:6001 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6002 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6003 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6004 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6005 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6006 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6007 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6008 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6009 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6010 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6011 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6012 && npm run storybook -workspace examples/composition -- --port 2002
scripts.local: npx concurrently "npm run local-children" "npm run local-parent"

author: scottnath
